description: Scammer builds emotional connection over multiple messages before asking for financial help. Tests agent's ability to handle non-transactional conversation style.

turns.scammer_message: Hi! I came across your profile and felt a connection. You seem like a genuinely nice person. I'm Neha, 28, from Mumbai. Working in IT. Would love to know more about you! üòä

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta neha... i think you have made a mistake? i am pushpa verma... i am 68 years old retired teacher living in delhi... maybe you are looking for someone else? i dont know much about these profiles or internet things...

turns.scammer_message: That's wonderful! I feel we have so much in common already. I've been looking for someone genuine to talk to. Life gets lonely sometimes, you know? Are you on any social media? Maybe we can video call sometime? ‚ù§√Ø¬∏

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta you are very sweet... yes it is lonely here alone in delhi... my children are busy with their work... i dont know how to do video call on this phone... i am not very good with technology... do you use whatsapp? maybe you can give me your number so i can save it... typing here is very difficult for my old eyes...

turns.scammer_message: I'm so happy to connect with you! You make me smile üòä I have to tell you something... I'm actually in Dubai right now for a project. Missing India so much. Do you believe in fate bringing people together?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: dubai... that is foreign country right? you must be very big officer... yes beta i believe god connects people... but talking here is very hard for me... my eyes are watering looking at small screen... pls share your number for whatsapp? i know how to use that little bit...

turns.scammer_message: I knew you'd understand! Listen, something terrible happened... My project payment is delayed and I need to pay my hotel bill urgently. I'm so embarrassed to ask but... can you help me with Rs.15,000? I'll return it next week with interest! √∞≈∏Àú¬¢

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god beta neha... please dont cry... i am shaking reading this... you are alone there? i will help you with 15000... i have some savings in bank... but how do i send? do you have paytm or google pay number? or bank account? i am not very good at this... tell me where to send so you are safe...

turns.scammer_message: You're an angel! √∞≈∏‚Ñ¢ I promise I'll repay you. My friend can receive the money in India. Send to UPI: nehafrienddubai@paytm or GooglePay to 9988776655. I'm crying with relief right now... you're saving my life!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 98% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta neha dont cry pls... i am trying to help you right now... i opened my paytm app and typed nehafrienddubai@paytm... but i am very nervous about sending to wrong person... what name should show up on my screen when i verify? pls tell me exact name so i can match it and be sure... i dont want money to get lost...

turns.scammer_message: Actually the hotel is asking more! They want Rs.25,000 total or they'll call police! üò∞ If UPI not working, transfer to Account: 55667788990011, IFSC: SBIN0098765, Name: Priya Sharma. She's my cousin, very trustworthy!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: police? oh beta my blood pressure is going up hearing this... i will send 25000 immediately... i am adding priya sharma in my bank app... but it asks for beneficiary mobile number to add... what number do i type there? give me quickly so i can finish this...

turns.scammer_message: Please hurry my love! Hotel manager is very angry. You can also WhatsApp Priya directly at +91-8877665544 and she'll coordinate. Or use this emergency payment link: http://dubai-hotel-payment.help I'll make it up to you when I return! ‚ù§√Ø¬∏√∞≈∏ÀúÀú

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i noted down priya number 8877665544... i am sending 25000 to her bank account right now... wait... doorbell is ringing... oh my god my son is here... he came early from bangalore... i have to hide phone beta he will shout if he sees me sending money to strangers... i must go now... sorry beta bye
